# RmyTools

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This is the package where Pietro stores miscellaneous utility functions for R.

## Installation

You can install the package from GitHub with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("pietroreggiani/RmyTools")
```
